0:
Text: The African Airlines Association (French: "Association Aérienne Africaine"), also known as the Association of African Airline Companies (French: "Association des Compagnies Aériennes Africaines") and by its abbreviation AFRAA, is a trade association of airlines which hail from the nations of the African Union.

Triplets:
<The African Airlines Association
